jd: From: Vijaya, KK Software vijayalakshmi.b@kksoftwareassociates.com Reply to: vijayalakshmi.b@kksoftwareassociates.com Title: DynamoDBFully RemoteWe are seeking a highly skilled Software Engineer with expertise in Amazon DynamoDB, and AWS Lambda to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable and high-performance applications that support our clients credit rating operations.Key Responsibilities:• Design, develop, and deploy serverless applications using AWS Lambda.• Implement and manage NoSQL databases using Amazon DynamoDB.• Optimize DynamoDB performance, including indexing, partitioning, and query optimization.• Develop and maintain data models and schemas for DynamoDB to support application requirements.• Implement data migration and replication strategies for DynamoDB.• Monitor and troubleshoot DynamoDB performance issues and ensure high availability.• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.• Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.• Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.• Help maintain code quality, organization, and automationRegards,B.
